name: Fractured Harry Potter Characters Quiz / Test | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Hagrid.

	Robbie Coltrane, the actor who plays him in the movies, is just great.

Albus Dumbledore.

	Hogwarts' headmaster. Richard Harris did a good job of portraying him--they gave him lots and lots of long white hair. After Harris's death, Michael Gambon took over the role.

Professor McGonagall.

	Maggie Smith is exquisite as Professor McGonagall--I wish she'd had more scenes. (Rent The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie if you like her.)

Hermione Granger.

	Emma Watson is prettier than Hermione is in the book. I like the book character better, but little Emma is very cute and does a good job.

Ron Weasley.

	The kid who plays Ron, Rupert Grint, is very cute and does a terrific job. He's not exactly like the Ron Weasley I'd pictured, but that's OK.

Dudley Dursley.

	The actor who plays him is perhaps not as fat as I'd pictured Dudley, but he does a good job of being obnoxious, greedy, and cowardly.

Voldemort.

	In the first movie, he's sufficiently creepy--only a face on the back of Professor Quirrell's head.

Neville Longbottom.

	He receives an award for standing up to his friends.
